chinese: 高级住宅区与旁边的贫民区形成明显对比
english: the high-end houses stand in stark contrast to the slums next to them
in the suburbs there are fewer houses but more trees

chinese: 柯基有着所有狗中最可爱的屁股
english: corgis have the cutest butts of all kinds of dogs

chinese: 这张图片上医学术语词汇表
english: this picture contains a glossary of medical terms

chinese: 侦探推断这个罪犯是金发，而且少一根手指
english: the detective deduced that the criminal is blonde and without one finger

chinese: 妈妈让步了，同意让小男孩再多看一会儿电视
english: the mother made a concession and allowed the boy to continue watching tv

chinese: 热狗的生产过程包括 3 个步骤
english: there're 3 steps in the procedure of hot-dog production

chinese: 这是我们饭店的几样特色菜
english: these're several kinds of specialties in our restaurant
the little girl was reproached by her mother

chinese: 他父亲是一个严肃，不苟言笑的人
english: his father is a solemn man and rarely smiles

chinese: 这位篮球运动员卑鄙的行为真的激怒了他的对手
english: the basketball player's dirty behavior really provoked his opponent
the positive and negative offset each other

chinese: 孩子们的学习负担太重了
english: the children's study strain is too heavy

chinese: 他正在参加一个重要的会议
被动吸烟会对儿童造成很大的伤害
english: passive smoking can cause great harm to children
